protein.specific_function: May function as an adapter protein. Required for efficient phagocytosis of apoptotic cells. Modulates cellular glycosphingolipid and cholesterol transport. May play a role in the internalization and endosomal trafficking of various LRP1 ligands, such as PSAP. Increases cellular levels of GTP-bound ARF6

reference.reference_text: Liu QA, Hengartner MO: Human CED-6 encodes a functional homologue of the Caenorhabditis elegans engulfment protein CED-6. Curr Biol. 1999 Nov 18;9(22):1347-50.
Smits E, Van Criekinge W, Plaetinck G, Bogaert T: The human homologue of Caenorhabditis elegans CED-6 specifically promotes phagocytosis of apoptotic cells. Curr Biol. 1999 Nov 18;9(22):1351-4.
